item.description:
Okay guys, we've got dinner plans for the Scavenger Hunt!! Yippee!

We'll be eating at the Thai Place, hopefully around 5 p.m., but with the chaos of the Saturday before Halloween in the Halloween mecca of New England, be prepared for some waiting:-)

We'll be meeting at 4:30 at the National Park Service Salem Visitor Center (2 New Liberty St Salem, MA 01970) the same site of our hunt meeting (at 6:30), and then head to the restaurant together.

For anyone taking the 4:30 Commuter Rail out of Boston, just meet us at the restaurant at 5 pm or as soon as you can get there. We'll save a spot for you as long as I know you're coming. So please RSVP with a definitive yes (and make a note about your plans), or you'll be stuck sitting at another table:-). Thai Place is located in Museum place mall, next to the cinema on Church street. Check out the website for directions: http://www.thaiplace....

Please let me know that you are definitively coming with a yes RSVP so we can arrange a table to the best of our ability amidst the chaos of Halloween in Salem.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting in front of the Visitor Center at 4:30, or look for our table
item.name: Pre-Scavenger Hunt Dinner at Thai Place
